testcase.name: Add and Remove Products
testcase.system-out: Given User Click on Order Online now........................................passed And User Enter the Address and Pincode......................................passed When User add the VEG PIZZA with following product and the quantity.........passed And User Subtotal the Cart value of VEG PIZZA with sum of (Each Product Value *Qty).passed And User Select the BEVERAGES as Pepsi475ml and the below quantity..........passed And User Subtotal the Cart value of BEVERAGES with sum of (Each Product Value *Qty).passed And User Removes the following product from the Cart........................passed And Subtotal the cart value with sum of (Each Product Value *Qty)...........passed Then User should get the Subtotal value of all Cart product and Click checkout.passed And Verify the Subtotal price with Place Order Price Details................passed
